attributes.action: make all domestic and commercial utility bills public to shame people into using less energy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By publicising everybody's gas and electricity bills, and producing "worst offender" lists, it might be possible to shame certain sections of society into reducing their energy consumption.
Taken a step further, council tax rebates for lowest users or even basing the council tax on kWh of gas and electricity used would encourage a reduction in energy use and add impetus to the inevitable move towards using renewables and microgeneration.
